name: Kirby on MS-DOS!
description:
LEGAL DISCLAIMER: This game is made for Kirby fans and is not associated in any way with HAL or Nintendo.

So you wanted to play Kirby,  but you wanted it to be a DOS game. Well... this game is for you!

It is a fangame for Windows that looks like a DOS game, using some limitations of a DOS machine in order to make it realistic.
